summary: Frontend testing of CapCut-style video editor advanced track system. All 12 requested features verified and working correctly.

code_quality.issue: Duplicate keys in iconPaths object: 'text' (lines 24, 141), 'sticker' (lines 26, 143), 'mute' (lines 81, 145). Causes Vite warnings but doesn't break functionality.

passed_tests: Click +Video button creates Video track - PASSED
Click +Audio button creates Audio track - PASSED
Click +Text button creates Text track - PASSED
Click +Sticker button creates Sticker track - PASSED
Add demo video and click + button to add clip to Video track - PASSED (turquoise + button appears on hover, clicking adds clip)
Track shows correct icon and colored background - PASSED (blue for video, green for audio, yellow for text, pink for sticker)
Track has 4 control buttons (mute/show/lock/delete) - PASSED (buttons visible in track label area)
Hover over Audio track shows Volume slider popup - PASSED (Vol 100% slider appears on hover)
Click Hide button (eye icon) toggles track opacity - PASSED (button turns orange when active)
Click Lock button toggles track locked state - PASSED (button turns yellow when active)
Locked track shows lock overlay - PASSED (lock icon visible on locked track)
Click Delete button removes track (with confirmation) - PASSED (window.confirm dialog appears)
action_items: OPTIONAL: Remove duplicate icon keys in Icon.jsx (lines 141-145) to eliminate Vite warnings
critical_code_review_comments: TimelinePanel.jsx: Track component (lines 267-487) implements all 4 control buttons correctly
TimelinePanel.jsx: NewTrackDropZone (lines 492-544) allows creating tracks by clicking +Video/+Audio/+Text/+Sticker
TimelinePanel.jsx: handleAddTrack (lines 689-714) creates tracks with correct type, name, and default properties
TimelinePanel.jsx: Track colors implemented via getTrackColor() - blue/green/yellow/pink for video/audio/text/sticker
TimelinePanel.jsx: Volume/Opacity slider popup (lines 431-447) appears on hover for audio/video tracks
TimelinePanel.jsx: Lock overlay (lines 459-467) shows lock icon when track.locked is true
EditorLayout.jsx: UPDATE_TRACK and DELETE_TRACK reducer actions (lines 140-163) handle track state changes
seed_data_creation: Demo media created automatically when entering editor. Tracks created via +Video/+Audio/+Text/+Sticker buttons.
mocked_features: Demo Video/Image/Audio are placeholders (no actual media files)
context_for_next_testing_agent: All track system features working: 1) +Video/+Audio/+Text/+Sticker buttons create tracks with correct colored backgrounds (blue/green/yellow/pink), 2) Track control buttons: Mute (audio/video only, red when active), Hide (eye icon, orange when active), Lock (yellow when active, shows overlay), Delete (with confirmation), 3) Volume/Opacity slider popup appears on hover for audio/video tracks, 4) Demo video can be added via + button on media tile. Test flow: Create project -> Click +Video/+Audio/+Text/+Sticker -> Hover track to see controls -> Click Hide/Lock/Delete buttons. Preview URL: http://localhost:3000
